"There are honest-hearted men and women out in the hills that must be given the message of warning. . . . Say not, 'We cannot afford to work in a sparsely-settled field, and largely in a self-supporting way, when out in the 


                     -9- 

world are great fields where we might reach multitudes.' And let none say, 'We cannot afford to sustain you in an effort to work in those out-of-the-way places.' What! Cannot afford it! You cannot afford not to work in these isolated places; and if you neglect such fields the time will come when you will wish that you had afforded it."
